amendatorysection.catchline: State hospitals for the mentally ill; official titles.
amendatorysection.para: The state hospital established in Lancaster County for the treatment of mental illnesses shall be known as the Lincoln Regional Center. The state hospital established in Madison County shall be known as the Norfolk Regional Center. The state hospital established in Adams County shall be known as the Hastings Regional Center.

crossreference.para: Convicted sex offenders, evaluation and treatment, see section 29-2925 et seq.
Mentally ill veterans, care and treatment of, see sections 80-601 to 80-606.

annotation.para: All hospitals for the insane of the state are governed by same general provisions. State v. Gage County, 100 Neb. 753, 161 N.W. 267 (1917).
